include for facebook name of the pattern and link to the pattern on ravelry https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/high-tide-waves for instagram tag the designer #bebablanket and the pattern name #hightidewavespattern thank you the pattern is created by bebablanket april 2019 https //beba-blanket weebly com/ ♡ https //linktr ee/bebablanket ♡ 9 corrections the pattern is corrected already round 16 - at the end of the round should be slip_stitch to the top of shallow bpsc round 18 - beginning of 4th line after pop instead of 1dc 1exdc into top of middle… should be 1dc 1exdc into top of middle… as those st do not go into the same st through all the pattern corrected st name btsc replaced with shallow back post single_crochet btdc replaced with shallow back post double_crochet added
